page.shortlink: grid component client side cansort event
page.description: Fires when the user tries to sort the Grid by clicking on a column title. If the event returns false, the action is cancelled.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: sortColumn
property.description: The column number the user clicked to sort the Grid. Column numbers correspond to the visible columns in the Grid.
